text: is a Japanese politician who has been the Chief Cabinet Secretary since 2023. He was the Minister for Foreign Affairs from 2021 to 2024. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He is also in the House of Representatives for the Yamaguchi 3rd district since 2021. In August 2024, Hayashi announced his candidacy for the Liberal Democratic leadership election to replace Prime Minister Fumio Kishida.
